MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Payment will be by deferred payment, after invoices have been delivered, and after funds from the Ministry of Education and Science of Macedonia have been received.

LEGAL_FORM.P: To be registered as a legal entity for conducting services related to the subject of the public procurement.

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: — license for free transport of passengers and special line transport of passengers issued by the Ministry of Transport and Connections,

— extract from License for free transport of passengers and special line transport of passengers issued by the Ministry of Transport and Connections, for the vehicles with which the transport of students will be conducted,

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Information and formalities necessary for evaluating if the requirements are met: Provided in the procurement documentation published on the Public Procurement System site: https://e-nabavki.gov.mk/PublicAccess/Notices/default.aspx?Level=2

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Documentation about income of the company, and the balance sheet and income statement from the company issued from the relevant authorities for the last 3 years.

EAF_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: The company must not have losses in the last year of operations.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — statement of the number of vehicles used by the Economic Operator (EO) containing the type of vehicle and the number of the registration plates. A copy of a valid traffic license and whether the mentioned vehicles are available or not for the relations for which the EO applies,
— statement of the number of drivers who are at the dispose of the EO along with forms M1/M2 and copies of their driving licenses with the appropriate category of the licenses,
— documents to confirm the technical exploitation conditions are met for every vehicle.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — for every relation for which the EO has supplied an offer he should have at his disposal an appropriate number of vehicles depending on the number of students and the number of seats must match the number of students,
— number of drivers must match the number of used vehicles,
— for every vehicle he must own valid documents for meeting the technical exploitation conditions.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The electronic auction will be through the public web-site https://e-nabavki.gov.mk

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The Managers of the companies or people authorized by them, along with authorization papers.

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Drzavna Komisija za zalbi po javni nabavki
